data.title: Corporate Membership
data.meta_description:
What’s the benefit of a Corporate Membership?

It simplifies billing - rather than receiving separate dues invoices for all individuals who are members from a company, the company will receive one invoice.
Benefits for entire company - you can assign an unlimited number of Individual Memberships for employees from your company.
Advertising - all Corporate Members will receive the following:

- Company Profile on TCC Website – Includes logo, short bio about c…
data.text:
Established in 2007 and based in Chicago, IL, Arka Express Inc. has evolved into a leading force in the logistics and transport sector, managing a fleet of 630 trucks and 1,500 dry-van trailers. Our expertise spans a broad spectrum of services including local, regional, dedicated, and over-the-road trucking, alongside comprehensive freight management solutions, catering primarily to Fortune 1000 companies across the eastern United States. As a SmartWay Transportation Partner, our commitment to sustainability is matched by our investment in a modern fleet and collaborations with top technology platforms such as FourKites and Project 44. Our dedication to quality, efficiency, and creating a positive environment for our team has been recognized through several prestigious awards: Schneider's 2022 Carrier of the Year, the 2023 Q3 Truckload Carrier of the Quarter from Echo Logistics, and being a finalist for the 2024 Best Fleets to Drive For, highlighting our excellence in service and innovation.

First Logistics, In the fast-paced world of logistics, your choice of a 3PL provider can make or break your business. And if your 3PL can’t change with you, your growth becomes a liability. First Logistics combines flexible teams, unparalleled operational expertise, and Tier 1 technology to make sure that as your business grows, your problems won’t grow with it. You’ll have the support and resources to scale your operations confidently and efficiently. At First Logistics, we pride ourselves on being more than just a service provider; we're your partner in success.

Freight Tech Cartage, Inc. is an asset based family owned business founded in 2005.

We are a full-service transportation company. Our dispatch, corporate office and repair

facility is located just minutes outside the Chicago city limits in Naperville, IL (the

second largest city in Illinois). Freight Tech Cartage, Inc. specializes in intermodal, dry and overweight transportation services throughout the Midwest (IL,IN,IA,MI,MO,OH,WI). Our Naperville location is a secured facility, located just north of interstate I-88 within minutes of several major traffic arteries and Chicagoland rail yards. The founders of Freight Tech Cartage, Inc. have over four decades of experience in the transportation industry, we have the knowledge and capabilities you can trust. The value of our vast experience is passed directly to you through our streamlined approach to delivering your cargo in a safe and timely manner. As drayage specialists, we serve as an integral link in the supply chain management system. We recognize the critical nature of our role, and we are dedicated to serving our clients in a competent and reliable manner, at all times. Freight Tech Cartage, Inc., is fully insured and holds Interchange Agreements with every Steamship Line servicing the Midwest Area. We find that through implementation of corporate strategy, which is centered around service, safety and security, we can do the best job of meeting our customers requirements in the most efficient and cost-effective manner. Our corporate mission is to continue to grow as a stable and value added resource in the transportation and logistics industry, and to provide superior services and support to our customers. We are a winning team of capable leaders who respond quickly and efficiently to change and are able to adapt aggressively to the customers' needs. We consider ourselves a partner with our customers' providing consistent, efficient and economical transportation services resulting in the accomplishment of our mutual goals. It is our pledge to accomplish these goals by operating safely with uncompromising integrity, availing benefits to our customers, employees, agents and the community at large.
